titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase and make permanent the election to expense certain refineries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/24/2008--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the expensing allowance for qualified refinery property from 50 to 100% of its cost for property placed in service after July 15, 2008, and before January 1, 2012. Makes permanent the 50% expensing allowance for such property.
